publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4619 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to NHS Lanarkshire MINTS Programme Graduatesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the 47 NHS Lanarkshire nurses who recently graduated from the Minor/Major Injury/Illness Nurse Treatment Service (MINTS) programme, which was launched in 2007; considers that these nurses will help improve patient care and reduce waiting times for patients throughout Lanarkshire after graduating from an innovative course, and notes that the course provides nurses with the skills to deal with minor and major injuries and illnesses, which will help reduce the time that patients have to wait for treatment. Supported by: Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jackie Baillie*, Des McNulty*, Jamie McGrigor*, Cathy Jamieson*, James Kelly*, Michael McMahon*, Mary Mulligan*, Aileen Campbell*, Sandra White*
S3M-4619 Congratulations to NHS Lanarkshire MINTS Programme Graduates (lodged on 22 July 2009) Trish Godman*, Elaine Smith*, Jamie Hepburn*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4619 Congratulations to NHS Lanarkshire MINTS Programme Graduates (lodged on 22 July 2009) Jack McConnell*, Sarah Boyack*, Marilyn Livingstone*
